neighborhood_overview:
Charlestown is Boston's oldest neighborhood. You'll be minutes away from Bunker Hill Monument, Freedom Trail, Warren Tavern, USS Constitution, and more! Enjoy Harborwalk with phenomenal water views. Quick walk on Charlestown Bridge will take you to historic North End - Boston's Little Italy- with dozens of restaurants to choose from.¬†

description:
Be Unique & Kind with Sleepy Panda Homes! Located in Charlestown - Boston's oldest neighborhood - we are Boston's only eco, vegan & cruelty-free accommodations! Charming French home hosts 2, or 3-4 by converting living room to a bedroom.

The space
üíöWe are eco-first because Planet Earth never gets a day off! If our ethos makes you uncomfortable, we encourage you to reconsider before booking with usüíö
_________________________________________
Our historic and charming 1-BR is located at the bottom of the Bunker Hill with phenomenal Monument views. It features 150-year-old original pumpkin floors and unique layout with two entrances. The unit ideally hosts couples, but parlor living room with a luxury sleeper sofa and separate entrance easily converts to a second bedroom, if needed.
